channel.title: Synergy on Rockhopper.dk
channel.description: Recent content in Synergy on Rockhopper.dk

item.title: Mouse hover not working in Chrome/Chromium? Solution: stop synergy
item.description:
I had a strange problem: when I was using Chromium (Open source version of Chrome): mouse hover was not working. Click, scroll and so on worked fine, but when the mouse hovered above an element on a webpage nothing happend.

After googling I found that synergy is the [cause][2], so now I only start synergy when I need it.

[2]: https://www.google.dk/search?q=chrome+hover+synergy
